name: Schuylkill Trust Company, Trustee, Appellant, v. Schuylkill Mining Company
name_abbreviation: Schuylkill Trust Co. v. Schuylkill Mining Co.

judges: Before Maxey, C. J., Drew, Linn, Stern, Stearne and Jones, JJ.
parties: Schuylkill Trust Company, Trustee, Appellant, v. Schuylkill Mining Company.

opinions.text:
The decree is affirmed on the opinion of President Judge Palmer of the court belotv. Costs to be paid by the appellant.
Per Curiam,
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: Henry Houck, with him Edgar Downey, for appellant.
Boy P. Hicks, with him James J. Gallagher, for ap-pellee, ;
casebody.head_matter:
Schuylkill Trust Company, Trustee, Appellant, v. Schuylkill Mining Company.
Argued January 7, 1948.
Before Maxey, C. J., Drew, Linn, Stern, Stearne and Jones, JJ.
Henry Houck, with him Edgar Downey, for appellant.
Boy P. Hicks, with him James J. Gallagher, for ap-pellee, ;
March 22,1948:
